Text: FW Hedge RecommendationFYI we only hedged due Credit Agreement limitations John Original Message From Melendrez Jesus Sent Thursday May PM To Josey Scott Thompson C John Keel Allan Cc Mujumdar Ravi Subject FW Hedge Recommendation Mariner executed earlier today a gas swap at MMBtu that results in Mariner being hedged on PDP gas from June to Dec The hedged volumes where approximately D from Jun to Sept and D from Oct to Dec Thx JGM Original Message From Pici Frank ENRON mailtoIMCEANOTESPiciCFrankCFPICImarinerenergyEcomE NRONcom Sent Thursday May PM To Melendrez Jesus Cc Calaway Maureen Harless Greg Subject Hedge Recommendation Jesus Please print the two attached files then have you and Ray sign the signature page and fax it back to Greg Harless for our files Frank Hedge Recommendation doc HedgeVolRecxls ps Maureen I will have Kimm bring the copy signed by Bob and me to you Hedge Recommendation doc HedgeVolRecxls
